price: (38) He is not but a man who has invented a lie about Allāh, and we will not believe him."
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
